title: How to Make Fluffy Slime Without Borax

steps.title: Pour the glue into a bowl.
steps.content: Pour the glue into a bowl. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Combine the warm water with the glue.
steps.content: Combine the warm water with the glue. Don't add too much water or it'll be very runny.

steps.title: Add in your food colouring and mix thoroughly.
steps.content: Add in your food colouring and mix thoroughly. If the food colouring is a particularly potent one, start by adding two drops, so you don't stain your hands.

steps.title: Add in the shaving cream and mix thoroughly.
steps.content: Add in the shaving cream and mix thoroughly. When it's fully combined in, the texture should resemble fluffy marshmallow cream.

steps.title: Add in a few pumps of lotion for a stretchier slime.
steps.content: Add in a few pumps of lotion for a stretchier slime.

steps.title: Add in the liquid laundry detergent.
steps.content: Add in the liquid laundry detergent. Don't add it all at once - you risk your slime hardening.

steps.title: Knead your slime.
steps.content: Knead your slime. Once the slime has become too solid to stir, use your hands to start kneading it to make it less sticky. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Play with your slime!
steps.content: Play with your slime! Store it in an airtight container. [4] X Research source
